original_text: Stephen then said, ‘After many years, the time arrived for God to make his promise to Abraham become true. By this time, Jacob's family who still lived in Egypt had become very many.
korean_text: 하나님이 아브라함에게 약속하신 때가 가까우매 이스라엘 백성이 애굽에서 번성하여 많아졌더니

sentences.original_text: for God to make his promise to Abraham become true
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 아브라함에게 한 약속을 이루시기 위한

sentences.original_text: Jacob's family who still lived in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 아직도 이집트에 살고 있던 야곱의 가족이
